```{r,echo=FALSE,warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(RColorBrewer)
library(reshape2)
library(DT)
library(RCurl)
library(htmltools)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)

files<-read.table("fileList1.txt", header=FALSE, as.is=TRUE)
if(nrow(files) == 1 & files$V2[1] == 'gsea'){
  #single cell GSEA result
  files<-read.csv(files$V1[1])
  files$Comparisons<-basename(dirname(files$Folder))
}else{
  rownames(files)<-files$V2
}

```
 
```{r gsea, results="asis", echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE} 
display_gsea(files, "")
```
